page_description: Invite friends to register, both parties get 100 credits reward, valid for 1 month

invite_code.title: My Invitation Code
invite_code.description: Share your invitation code with friends. When they register successfully with your code, both of you will receive 100 credits reward

rules.title: Reward Rules:
rules.rule_1: When an invitee successfully registers with your code, both parties receive 100 credits
rules.rule_3: You can invite multiple friends, invitation rewards are cumulative
rules.rule_4: Each new user can only use one invitation code
